body.p: I am counsel for Mr Isaac Sutton, the petitioner.

It is morally certain to my mind that he failed to pay the $10. State tax on City license, because of ignorance on his part of the law, and without the remotest design to evade in. Accompanying certificates show that he has paid in all the sum of $16567 on a/c of city license

On trial of his case he exhibited his certificates of city license in attestation of
his good faith, plead that he was ignorant of the law as to county license; and produced also a certificate that he had paid the small amount of this county license soon as he discovered it was his duty to do so. These defenses were adjudged insufficient. The jury were virtually instructed to find against deft.; but his honor Judge Doniphan remarked on the bench the case was one which well merited Executive clemency

Isaac Suttons petn
